Transcription for 580963

My sister came to see me on the terrace, but she came to visit me.
We used to meet in the hall, big hall, it was like, we used to do like games there,
we used to have like dance in there, pictures there as well.
I can remember the tea dances that we used to do there, and shows,
we had different shows, pantomimes there as well.
